title: Opt into fully transitive copies under a change wave
body:
Before change waves existed, we didn't have a way to opt into reasonable behavior in dotnet/msbuild#4865, so we left the default as it was. But that's confusing, broken, and hard to discover that you need to opt into one of the reasonable states.

We should opt into `MSBuildCopyContentTransitively=true` under a change wave (16.10?).

nodes.body: I reactivated #1054 so calling this a dupe.
